title: Hello! I wish to exchange art for RP!
body:
Bard is my favorite League of Legends character. Everything about Bard is awesome and I would like to purchase a Chroma for my favorite cosmic friend! However, I'm saving RP for another cosmic acquaintance, Soraka.

Unfortunately, if I purchase a Bard Chroma for 290 RP, I'll be short 5 RP for the Star Guardian Soraka skin! I have come to you, great Rioters, to exchange art for RP so that I may acquire both! For your viewing pleasure, I have created a pixel Bard! I hope that you will love Bard as much as I do!

http://i.imgur.com/6BO0VsT.png

replies.body: Oh wow, this is some of the best pixel art I've seen.  Really, amazing job!  You might find that some poros left some RP on your account.  :)

Thank you so much! I appreciate your generosity! :D

I've been trying to learn pixel art because it's one of my favorite mediums! I'm still learning, but one day I hope to create a magnificent Bard (and other things)!
